message: This is a unique opportunity to own a top-of-the-line product that will revolutionize your business. With a value of $30000 to you, I'm offering it to you for just $10000. This is a limited-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal anywhere else. What do you say? Will you take advantage of this incredible offer?
I'll take it, but I'm only doing this because I'm curious about the game, not because I believe in the product's value.
